name: Kart Wars - Dodge 'em all!
description:
Attempt to drive around the track, picking up all the flags along the way while avoiding a head-on collision with the other cars! Kart Wars is a pure action-packed arcade game!

Are you ready to win the race?

Some features:
* Simple controls: just swipe to move the kart;
* Retro styled voxel graphics;
* Action packed gameplay;
* HD graphics optimized for Retina & iPhone 6/6+ support;
* Game Center support: compete with friends for the best high score;
* Playable for everybody and anybody! Fun for all ages! Challenge your skill and reflexes!
* Expressly and exclusively designed for Apple’s iOS platform (iPhone and iPad);
* Premium game - no in app purchase roadblocks!


Thanks for using our products. Feedback is always welcome to: support@dighentis.com
App Store reviews are greatly appreciated, thank you.
